explains: adv. 无可非议地；确凿地，肯定地

sentences.en: It was unquestionably a step in the right direction.
sentences.cn: 这无疑是朝正确方向迈出的一步。

sentences.en: They have seen the change as unquestionably beneficial to the country.
sentences.cn: 他们认为这场变革对该国无疑是很有益的。

sentences.en: Now, this thing had actually and unquestionably failed.
sentences.cn: 现在，它实际上毫无疑问地失败了。
